txt.en: You have broken the Orcs' siege weapons and have slowed down their ability to join the battle.

The siege weapons can be found before the Rammas Echor's southern gate, at the northmost edge of Lossarnach.\n\nYou should break the Orcs' siege weapons in order to hobble, or at least slow down, their ability to do harm.
You have destroyed the Orkish siege equipment at the Harlond.

You have found a number of great Orkish war machines assembled before the Rammas Echor gate. Doubtless they are destined to be used against Minas Tirith in battle. Destroying these machines should make the Orcs at the Harlond less of a threat.
DNT Look at that thar siege. Let's smush it.
The Orkish siege weapons found before the Rammas Echor's southern gate should be broken.

The siege weapons can be found before the Rammas Echor's southern gate, at the northmost edge of Lossarnach.\n\nYou should break the Orcs' siege weapons in order to hobble, or at least slow down, their ability to do harm.
